title: China backs Russia in its demands for security guarantees from the U.S. after Putin-Xi call
content:
1. China backs Russia in its demands for security guarantees from the U.S. after Putin-Xi call  The Washington Post
  2. China's Xi reportedly backs Putin in Russia's bid for security guarantees from the West  CNBC
  3. Putin, Xi hold video call as tensions with US escalate  Fox News
  4. Putin and Xi Hold Video Summit  The New York Times
  5. Putin assures Xi he will go to Winter Olympics in show of unity  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: プーチン-習近平電話会談後、米国に安全保障を要求するロシアを支持する中国
普京与习近平通话后，中国支持俄罗斯要求美国提供安全保障的要求
普京與習近平通話後，中國支持俄羅斯要求美國提供安全保障的要求
